name: Ipad file manager
short_description:
FHub: An iPad File Manager App Which Does More: http://www.fhubapp.com.

Ipad file transfer (http://www.fhubapp.com) is an apps give you flexibilities to transfer data from iPad device to any devices (PC, laptops, smart phones, iPads, tablet devices, …) and vice versa wirelessly.

Ipad file browser (http://www.fhubapp.com) give you way to browse websites in many tabs, download files from websites, intelligent downloader can detect a source is a file or a HTML page and allows download files in almost websites
- Export pages to PDF, WebArchive or HTML
- Bookmark favorite pages
- History bookmarks
- Surf web in fullscreen mode
summary: FHub: An iPad File Manager App Which Does More
